allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement COSMIC CHAOS playable prototype

Complete tower defense game with:
- Three.js + React Three Fiber for 3D rendering
- 4 enemy types \(Blobbert, Sir Scuttles, Chonkzilla, Floofernaut\)
- 3 tower types \(Plasma Spire, Rail Cannon, Nova Launcher\)
- Captain Zara hero with Q/W/R abilities
- Wave spawning system with 5 waves
- Win/lose conditions
- React UI overlay \(HUD, tower menu, hero panel\)
- Zustand state management

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
